sentence.Network_en: Meanwhile, relevant authorities destroyed eight ice - manufacturing factories , 12 MDMA - processing workshops and two methaqualone - processing establishments.
sentence.Network_cn: 同时, 我们还摧毁制造冰毒的加工点8个 、 制造“摇头丸”的加工点12个、制造安眠酮的加工点2个.
